Hello, I am Maxence

Software Engineer

Master's Graduate in Computer Science & Programming | Actively Seeking Software Engineering Opportunities.

Download my resume View my work experience

I am a results-driven Software Engineer and Product Manager with a Master's degree in Computer Science from Epitech (European Institute of Technology) in Paris, France, and international experience in both Europe and the U.S. After completing a year of study in New York specializing in Fintech and leading a team of 10 in my Epitech Innovative Project, I joined Debt Consultants Group in October 2024 as their first and sole software engineer.

In this role, I have independently imagined, designed, and built six impactful end-to-end solutions from a fully integrated onboarding portal with admin dashboards (leveraging Next.js, Node.js, AWS SAM, DynamoDB, and Salesforce integration), to AI-augmented web scrapers and automation tools that have directly generated leads, streamlined operations, and saved hundreds of work hours across departments. I introduced structured development processes using GitHub and best coding practices, becoming a central force behind the company’s digital transformation.

I thrive in fast-paced environments where I can blend technical innovation with business strategy, always focusing on performance, automation, and growth.
